name: Robot Factory v0.35
description:
This is the 2nd build for the 2020 SAU Senior Project. 

“Helloooooo! Welcome to the Robot Factory! As our newest recruit, your job is to deliver boxes to their appropriate conveyor belts. But be careful! Your cargo is a bit… explosive, to say the least. But don’t let that stop you! You’ve got a quota to meet. So get to work!”

User feedback? Yes please!

Please take this google survey or leave a comment after playing the game so we can collect feedback. Tell your friends and share this around! The more feedback we receive the more we can fix and add more fun mechanics for a better experience!

https://forms.gle/6MQhhN3ix8AUjuco9
